meanings.definition: Below the average level or standard.
meanings.sent1: The student's subaverage performance on the test was concerning.
meanings.sent2: Her subaverage height made it difficult for her to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: The subaverage amount of candy in the jar left the children disappointed.
meanings.sent4: The subaverage speed of the turtle was no match for the rabbit.
meanings.sent5: The subaverage quality of the product was evident in its cheap materials.

meanings.sent1: His subaverage score in the game was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The subaverage temperature in the room made it uncomfortable for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The subaverage number of guests at the party made it feel empty.
meanings.sent4: Her subaverage singing voice couldn't compete with the talented performers.
meanings.sent5: The subaverage amount of sunlight in the room made it feel gloomy.
